state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Corridor =- Well, here we are in a corridor. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is not blocked by one. There is an exit to the south. > -= Corridor =-0/1
next_state: -= Bathroom =- You arrive in a bathroom. An ordinary kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement. You can see a toilet. The toilet is white. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Bathroom =-0/2

admissible_commands: put red bell pepper on toilet
